summary: A strong technical foundation has been built through over two years of hands-on experience in Fullstack Development and Data Engineering, particularly in Odoo, PostgreSQL, Golang, and Laravel. Effective collaboration with both the QA and Functional teams, allowing for the delivery of features and improvements, is a notable skill, as well as experience working with international teams, which highlights adaptability and a global perspective.
additionalSummary: My career aspirations revolve around programming, specifically in Backend Development, Fullstack Development, and Data Engineering. Enthusiasm exists for using skills and expertise to contribute to programming projects and continually improving capabilities in these areas.
